what did you change?
it says i dont have permissoin to change xorg.conf

remove the UseFBDev option, as it is unused by the driver, added noDCC option to tell the driver no to ask the monitor what refreshrates to use but to use the ones provided in the monitorsection in horizsync and vertrefresh
gksudo gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf or on cli sudo nano /etc/X11/xorg.conf
why gksudo and not just sudo?
for graphical programs always use gksudo as it can come to problems with the environment using just sudo with them
ok, now control alt backspace?
